tnc.title: General Terms and Conditions
tnc.description: I accept the terms and conditions

own_funds.title: Source of the assets to be invested
own_funds.description: I confirm that all assets that I contribute to DFX belong exclusively to me.

own_funds_organization.title: Source of the assets to be invested
own_funds_organization.description: I confirm that all assets that I contribute to DFX belong exclusively to my registered organization.

source_of_funds.title: Source of the assets to be invested
source_of_funds.description: Where does most of the money come from?

area.title: Area self-employed
area.description: In which area are you self-employed? Please describe your activity and customers in 2-3 sentences.

occupation.title: Professional activity
occupation.description: How would you describe your job?

employer.title: Employer
employer.description: What is the name of your employer? For people without an employment relationship, what is the name of your university, school or, for retired, unemployed and pensioners, the name of your last employer.

sector.title: Branche
sector.description: What industry do you work in or did you last work in?

sector_organization.title: Branche
sector_organization.description: What industry do your organization work in?

risky_business.title: Risky business activities
risky_business.description: Are you involved in potentially risky business activities such as arms dealing, casinos, diamonds, exotic animals, pornography or prostitution?

risky_business_organization.title: Risky business activities
risky_business_organization.description: Is your organization involved in potentially risky business activities such as arms dealing, casinos, diamonds, exotic animals, pornography or prostitution?

income_organization.title: Annual turnover
income_organization.description: What is the annual turnover of your organization?

assets_organization.title: Assets
assets_organization.description: What is the organization's balance sheet?

notification_of_changes.title: Notification of changes
notification_of_changes.description: I confirm that I will immediately inform DFX via app.dfx.swiss/support/issue of any relevant changes on my part.

option.share_sale: Sale of shares or other investments
